text: Click here for Consultant, Specialist & Other Post Details SAIL Bhilai Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 96 OCT, ACT & Other Posts: Steel Authority of India Limited (SAIL), Bhilai Steel Plant, Chhattisgarh has invited applications for the recruitment of 96 Attendant cum Technician (ACT) – (T/ BO), Operator cum Technician (OCT) – (T), Attendant cum Fire Engine Driver (T), Mining Mate vacancies. Eligible candidates may apply online from 17-02-2017 to 16-03-2017. Other details like age, qualification, selection process, how to apply are given below… SAIL Bhilai Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 96 Name of the Posts: 1. Attendant cum Technician (Trainee) Heavy Vehicle Driver/ Boiler Operation: 33 Posts i. ACT (T) – Heavy Vehicle Driver: 10 Posts ii. ACT – Boiler Operation: 23 Posts 2. Operator cum Technician (Trainee) – (Special Recruitment Drive for ST): 50 Posts i. OCT (T) – Metallurgy: 20 Posts ii. OCT (T) – Mechanical: 30 Posts 3. Attendant cum Fire Engine Driver (Trainee): 08 Posts 4. Mining Mate: 05 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age should be 18 – 28 years as on closing date of receipt of application for Post 1. Upper age limit is relaxable by 5 years for SC/ ST and 3 years for OBC candidates, 10 years for PwD candidates as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Matriculation with valid Heavy Motor Vehicle (HMV) License & relevant experience for Post 1, Matriculation and ITI (Full time) institute with either 1st class or Boiler Attendant Competency for Post 2, Matriculation, full time Diploma in Engineering from a Government recognized institute in Metallurgy/ Mechanical discipline with minimum 50% marks for Post 3, Matriculation with valid Driving License for Heavy Motor Vehicles for Post 4, Matriculation with valid Mining Mate’s certificate of Competency from DGMS under MMR Act 1961 & relevant experience for Post 5. Selection Process: Selection will be Written Test, Trade Test/ Skill Test/ Driving test. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 250/- for Post 2, Rs. 150/- for Post 1, 3, 4 by online through Net banking/ Credit Card/ Debit Card or by SBI Challan. No fee for SC/ ST/ PwD/ ESM or Departmental candidates. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website “www.sail.co.in” from 17-02-2017 to 16-03-2017. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Login through the website “www.sail.co.in”. 2. Click on Careers –> Bhilai Steel Plant. 3. Select desired post & click on Apply. 4. Fill all the details carefully & submit the form. 5. Take printout of application for future use. Important Dates: Start Date to Apply Online: 17-02-2017. Last Date to Apply Online & Payment of Fee: 16-03-2017.
